comment_content.original_script: The DUP is the political wing of the Free Presbyterian Church, founded by the late unlamented Ian Paisley senior, who was constantly in a state of mouth-foaming rage against Catholicism and thought that the EU was a Catholic plot to depose the queen of England. The DUP have stated many times that they would gladly sacrifice Brexit if the only other alternative was a deal that would weaken their union with the rest of the UK. Arlene is the First Minister in the power-sharing Stormont Executive and she takes her role very seriously - although the Executive hasn't actually sat now for 3 years. They want Northern Ireland to be a free, peaceful and inclusive society - just so long as you do what they tell you to do. They have always enjoyed a very good and close working relationship with the PM's that served in Westminster through the years and they always felt some regret when a PM would lose his or her job when they didn't do what the DUP asked of them.
